resources.string: "Innovative Consultancy sollution" a app that developed by group called "static Innovators" to bring all kind of consultancy service in one platform.Anyone with successful career in anyfield can join as a consultant.He or she can upload blog and video related to his industry to help people in free.Meanwhile anyone who is seeking help from consultant can join as a user.A user can see all the details of the consultant. If he likes anyoneâ€™s profile then he can hire him.Basically "Innovative Consultancy Sollution" a platform that help people to guide others and seeking guidance from others.
